snippet.title: Trinity Trigger | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Trinity Trigger, an all-new action role-playing game combining the look and feel of iconic RPGs of the ‘90s with a modern emphasis on fast-paced, customizable combat.

Players take control of three young heroes as they attempt to defy fate and save the continent of Trinitia. Accompanying them are the Triggers, strange creatures with the unique ability to transform into eight types of weapons that players must master if they hope to be successful on their quest. Whether playing alone or with up to two friends via local co-op, explore diverse biomes and dungeons, strategize to exploit enemy weaknesses, and change your destiny!

Coming in Early 2023!

Official site: https://marvelousgames.com/games/trinity-trigger
Twitter: http://twitter.com/marvelous_games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/marvelousgames
Instagram: http://instagram.com/marvelous_europe
